content: lizard ridge dishcloth materials sugar n cream stripes less than 1 ball us size 6 needles pattern notes  to wrap and turn w&t hold the working yarn to the right side of the piece slip the next stitch temporarily to the other needle move the yarn back to the wrong side and then slip the unworked stitch back to its original needle turn your work  to pick up wrapped stitches when purling lift the wrap from behind with the tip of the working needle put in on the other needle and then purl the two together  to pick up wrapped stitches when knitting insert the working needle into the wrap first then into the stitch to be knit and knit the two together directions cast on 43 stitches using long-tail cast on knit one row row 1 rs knit row 2 knit row 3 knit row 4 note pick up and purl the wraps as you meet them p12 *wrap & turn w&t k8 w&t p7 w&t k6 w&t p5 w&t k4 w&t p20* end last repeat p9 instead of 20 row 5 knit picking up and knitting the wraps as you meet them row 6 knit row 7 knit row 8 knit row 9 knit row 10 note pick up and purl the wraps as you meet them p5 w&t k5 turn p4 w&t k4 turn p19 w&t k8 w&t p7 w&t k6 w&t p5 w&t k4 w&t p20 w&t k8 w&t p7 w&t k6 w&t p5 w&t k4 w&t p16 then at end of row turn k5 w&t p5 turn k4 w&t p4 row 11 knit picking up and knitting the wraps as you meet them row 12 knit repeat row 1-12 four times total then knit one row and bind off knitwise to use 2 colors one option is to use a 2nd color on row 3 4 9 and 10 another option is to switch colors on row 6 and 12 ©2008 by laura aylor all rights reserved
